```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
audio_features <- read.csv(file='../data/audio_features.csv')

participant_clips <- read.csv(file='../data/SSA_table.csv')
```

```{r}
audio_features$cleaned <- gsub(".wav", "", audio_features$song_title) %>%
  tolower()
participant_clips$cleaned <- tolower(participant_clips$Clip.Title)
audio_with_clips = merge(audio_features, participant_clips, by.x = "cleaned", by.y="cleaned", all.x = TRUE)
unique(audio_with_clips$cleaned)
```

#checks
```{r}
aov <- aov(data = audio_with_clips, event_density ~ Time.Period)
summary(aov)

aov <- aov(data = audio_with_clips, RMS_energy ~ Time.Period)
summary(aov)

aov <- aov(data = audio_with_clips, pulse_clarity ~ Time.Period)
summary(aov)
```
